name: 贱贱猫-魔性格斗大师
description:
it is a super-magic fighting rhythm game. Familiarity and mastery of rhythm will fall in love with this game!

In 3 minutes you will love this game!

- Hit objects flying from both sides according to the rhythm!
- Click the left and right screens to control the cat to punch.
- 3 music to your magical experience!
- Normal and Hell modes give you a completely different experience!
